channel.title: Modern warefare 2
channel.description: So I'm thinking about buying it for the p.c. Anyone wanna give me some reviews? Is it worth buying it for the pc? How are the graphics maxed? Is the storyline good?

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“atrox_, post:20, topic:320377”][quote author=eczema3 link=topic=416856.msg3069135#msg3069135 date=1261423392]

Is that the one where you just kill civilians?

Have you not played gta?

Yep its that one, and yeah of course I’ve played gta. I don’t know why cod affected me so much more.
[/quote]Realism. No moron in real life would ever run around like you do in GTA, however in cod, you are aware that what is going on is very possible, and that things like this have actually happened.

That is why it is so captivating.

PS: You should have played Cod4 first, otherwise you miss the big surprise after “The Gulag”

“Who’s Soap?”

but who was phone?[/quote]
Special forces tradition; everyone gets stupid nicknames. Meat, Chew, Phone, Soap, Razor etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:8, topic:320377”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=416856.msg3065417#msg3065417 date=1261187369]

beat the campaign in an hour

real kids play on veteran
[/quote]
real kids beat veteran in an hour[/quote]

ouch…

though, not possible without hacks.

Read full topic

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:21, topic:320377”]Okay I finished the campaign. Perhaps I should have played the other cod games before this one because that ending made no fucking sense. It really annoyed me that it ended like that without much explanation to people who haven’t played the other games.

Oh well…[/quote]Well it WAS a sequel…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Okay I finished the campaign. Perhaps I should have played the other cod games before this one because that ending made no fucking sense. It really annoyed me that it ended like that without much explanation to people who haven’t played the other games.

Oh well…

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Was in a public match today where it was sped up like crazy, was so fun, you run around the map so fast and the music at the end speeds up and sounds like pokemon. Was epic.

Read full topic

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

“PS3 patch just went live! Includes the Akimbo 1887s re-balancing, fix for Prestige hack, & fix for Public “private” Match. The Xbox 360 version will be getting the same, just waiting on ETA on it’s release” From fourzerotwo’s twitter (some guy who works at IW)

Read full topic

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:14, topic:320377”][quote author=Niall link=topic=416856.msg3066308#msg3066308 date=1261249225]
Is that the one where you just kill civilians?

Have you not played gta?
[/quote]
Yep its that one, and yeah of course I’ve played gta. I don’t know why cod affected me so much more.[/quote]Realism. No moron in real life would ever run around like you do in GTA, however in cod, you are aware that what is going on is very possible, and that things like this have actually happened.

That is why it is so captivating.

PS: You should have played Cod4 first, otherwise you miss the big surprise after “The Gulag”

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Wewt, post:12, topic:320377”]If there weren’t any glitches in it, it would be excellent.
However, IW won’t fix these glitches for a while, I’m sure. So until then, it sucks.[/quote]
You act as if Call of Duty 4 didn’t have glitches when it was first released… give it time.

Read full topic

item.description:

If there weren’t any glitches in it, it would be excellent.
However, IW won’t fix these glitches for a while, I’m sure. So until then, it sucks.

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

I found this game awesome, online is really on only good on the systems though =/

I tend to love the glitch games too; it makes it more fun imo. 4 nukes btw so far

Read full topic

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:9, topic:320377”]Just downloaded it and started playing the campaign today. Not really sure what I think of it, some of it is just way too over the top. Although it’s probably one of the first games to make me feel a little bit shocked (3-4th mission in the airport).

I obviously can’t comment on multiplayer as its a cracked version.

p.s. - this is the first cod game i’ve ever played[/quote]

Is that the one where you just kill civilians?

Have you not played gta?

Read full topic

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Just downloaded it and started playing the campaign today. Not really sure what I think of it, some of it is just way too over the top. Although it’s probably one of the first games to make me feel a little bit shocked (3-4th mission in the airport).

I obviously can’t comment on multiplayer as its a cracked version.

p.s. - this is the first cod game i’ve ever played

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

It’s a shit game, IW really didn’t bother this time. There’s an enormous list of stupid bugs/glitches and on the console version there a ‘virus’ going round that gives everyone unlimited ammo if this guy joins your game. Keep playing Call of Duty 4, it was so much better.

Read full topic

item.title: Modern warefare 2
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:2, topic:320377”]Graphics are amazing, story is good.

MP gets boring in a couple days, its worse than the other 2 games.[/quote]
story isnt great its average. And yea the MP is pretty damn shite, its exactly the same as 4, if i’d wanted that i wouldnt have bought a new game and just kept on playing 4 instead but oh well they had a brief blip of fame now they fucked it with a second release

Read full topic
